segments.text: I'm looking for a good multivitamin . Can you recommend one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Come with me to the vitamin section .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I knew there would be a few choices , but this selection is huge !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're looking for a multi though , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . Just a simple multi-vitamin that I can take every day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Then I recommend this one . It's made especially for men about your age .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! You took the guesswork right out of that one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's my job ! Is there anything else I can assist you with ?
segments.speaker: S2
